title: E-Learning Program Development and Effective Delivery Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in educational program planning
context.additional_context: A course strengthening e-learning program development and operational capabilities in language fields for in-service professionals. Requires customized strategies comprehensively considering organizational culture, technical infrastructure, and learner characteristics

learning_goals: Analyze national and organizational environments to incorporate into e-learning program planning
Design effective instructional models considering learner characteristics and technological constraints
Develop e-learning content applicable to real-world job environments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
